name: Turnip Totality DX
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2020: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/turnip-totality-deluxe-3

You are the dragon protector of the ancient forest. Global Lumberjacks LLC is deforesting your home. Use your turnip breath and the power of trees. Defend your home and repair the ecological damage.

BluShine: Lead Developer, Co-Designer

berryfoxes: 3D modeling, Co-Designer

RacingForTheFinish: Co-Designer

Trees and flower from kenny.nl

Sound Effects from Carlos_Vaquero
